modName: Link Follower From The Legend Of Zelda
summary: Link, he is a bit over powered.
descriptionHtml:
This is a Link follower. This is my first mod ever, of all time, for any game, so don\'t be too hard on me if you don\'t like it. He can be found in Jorrvaskr, the companions HQ.
Installation: Drag .esp to data.
Mod is also on the workshop.
UPDATE: THIS MOD IS REQUIRED: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3216
THIS MOD IS RECOMMENDED: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2588
Required mod has sword, shield, and armor. Recommended mod gives link blue eyes.
 UPDATE: Up and running again! yay! I have now added an old files section.
author: Link4799
